thread.title: Trump and Kim, Odd Bedfellows, Face Both Opportunity and Peril

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: Trump and Kim, Odd Bedfellows, Face Both Opportunity and Peril
text:
They are the oddest of bedfellows: The 71-year-old American president who has lived for almost four decades in the constant glare of a media spotlight, and his North Korean counterpart whose life is so shrouded in mystery that outsiders aren’t quite sure of his age (is it 34 or 36?).
Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un are not only of different generations, they may as well be from different planets. What’s more, they have been engaged in an epic exchange of insults; Mr. Trump has called the North Korean a “madman,” while Mr. Kim...
